cast.overview: The story about the men who made the world of technology what it is today, their struggles during college, the founding of their companies, and the ingenious actions they took to build up the global corporate empires of Apple Computer Inc. and Microsoft Corporation.
cast.title: Pirates of Silicon Valley

details.biography: Born in Hamilton on March 2, 1973, Popowich was raised in Stoney Creek, Ontario. In high school, he studied dramatic arts and classical piano. When he was 15 he landed his first professional acting role in the feature Tommy Tricker and the Stamp Traveller with La Fete Productions. Popowich has performed in numerous features and television series.
details.name: Paul Popowich
